price: 13.Yallih digaalá keenil obtek wadir kassit anninnal keenih yakkeeh nummah baxxaqqa iyya farmoytay (Nabii Mucammad kinnuk) baxxaqqa iyya diinil rubsumc keenih amaatuk.
arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: annā lahumu al-dhik'rā waqad jāahum rasūlun mubīnun
